item.description:
Health & Wellness Expo

Saturday, February 27 from 10 AM - 3 PM
Northshore Mall in Peabody, MA

Presented by the Salem, Peabody & Beverly Chambers of Commerce


This event is sponsored by: North Shore Medical Center, Lahey Clinic and Beverly Hospital.


The 6th Annual Health & Wellness Expo will showcase products and services for those interested in leading a healthier lifestyle. Over 45 local and national companies will provide free information, screenings, demonstrations and product samples. The Expo will encompass a broad range of products and services including traditional and alternative health practitioners, senior services, healthy food, non-toxic cleaning solutions and much more! The Expo is free to attend and offers something for the entire family.

Who will be participating?

Hospitals, Health Care Professionals, Physical Fitness Organizations, Personal Trainers, Nutritionists, Dentists, Orthodontists, Home Health Aids, Childcare Centers, Childcare Providers, Home Care Providers, Financial Planners, Health Insurance Providers, Homeopathic Solutions, Emergency Services, Substance Abuse Programs, Alternative Therapies, Yoga Instructors, Optometrists, Day Spas, or any product or service that focuses on health and wellness.

We look forward to seeing you there!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the food court, then we can all find it together.
item.name: Health & Wellness Expo
